description:
With the installation of the stabilizer, Misao becomes visible to everyone. Seeing the new Misao adapting well to life as an ordinary school girl, Tomoharu reflects on the past. At the same time, Yo and Shuri think back to the events leading up to the accident and the day their peaceful lives came to an end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dispersing Dream of the Cruel Sky
Mujou na Sora ni Chitta Yume
